name: Omega Racers
description:
Isometric 3D race with a fun challenge.

Race against the clock on the Practice mode or face opponents and dispute the pole position in this racing game inspired by some retro games, like Rock 'n Roll Racing.

Current Features

  • 4 tracks to play
  • 4 different characters each with a exclusive car
  • Challenge mode to training your driving skills against obstacles
  • Practice mode to training solo + ghost car
  • Arcade mode to training versus AI
  • Tournament mode versus AI
